name: E.O.S.: Exhibition of Speed
overview: E.O.S.: Exhibition of Speed is a racing game with over twenty fictional cars to choose from and a total of fifteen racecourses that differ in weather conditions. The game offers several modes like: trophy, quick race, time trial, online and a multiplayer mode for up to four players. When playing different drivers and cars with different characteristics can be selected. Additional cars can be unlocked during play.
